duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer the Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) and Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) for Sims North America operations.
Maintain equipment registers within both financial system (AX) and maintenance system (MEX) software applications in accordance with Global Standards.
Generate reports within the CMMS to facilitate the effective use of the system by Regional Operations and Maintenance teams.
Collaborate with the Business Intelligence team to build and generate Power BI reports for Operations Managers, Procurement, Asset Development, and Asset Optimization teams.
Monitor and drive global standardization of Preventative Maintenance programs and report on exceptions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Maintenance Management, Facilities Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
